TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, it is given to you by God.

I wish I had a lemon.

Granted, it burns your house down.

I wish for a cookie.

Its sugar free

I wish for a gattling gun.

Granted, A scout kill you for your sandvich!

I wish for more science!

Granted. There is now no reason to continue the space program.

I wesh u al liekd mudkipz

Granted, Mudkipz now dies into nonexistanse.

I wish for a harmless hamster.

Granted, you accidentally sit on it

i wish for a shark tank

Granted, it eat you

I wish for Giant Squid vs Sand Shark 2

Granted, it's directed by M. Night Shyamalan

I wish for a Bugatti Veyron.

Granted, it burns your house down. *snip*

Good one. Anyways:

Granted, the girl of your dreams asks you if you own a bmw. You don't so she says "then we just won't work out".

I wish to blow up. I mean like get big- *explodes*

Granted, everyone you love dies as well

I wish we could travel faster than light

Granted, everyone you love dies as well

I wish we could travel faster than light

Granted, but as soon we can travel faster than light, the Intergalactical FTL Inc invades us because they already patented the FTL drive and they doesn't want someone to make an open source version of their exorbitantly priced FTL drive that is supposed to use some extremely hard to get lightinium while it is possible to make a much more cheaper FTL drive using Alcubierre metric and Woodward effect negative mass-energy generator

I wish I could become my avatar (everyone that know what my avatar is gets +infinite, with citation please)

Granted, you shift from dimention and, well, live in the world of this guy

I wish I could get a back story for my avatar (or OC, if you know this term)

Granted, the back story is your Avatar caused Squad to shut down KSP.

I wish I knew What makes me

Granted, but the knowledge is incomprehensible to you and embedded in your mind. Attempting to access this knowledge causes you to go into a three-year coma, and this knowledge is implanted into the region of your brain responsible for breathing.

I wish I had some nails.

Granted, you sit on them, (nailed it )

I wish to make smile the mods

Granted. We smile, showing teeth as sharp as a shark's, and jagged as the same. Our smiles grow bigger and bigger, impossibly huge, until all our bodies are obscured by our expanding mouths. We slowly close in from all around, with cold eyes and fevered breaths, and eat you, one slice of your full length at a time.

I wish I could be more terrifying

Granted, but your so terrifying everyone commits suicide since their too afraid to continue living.

I wish for more time to use the computer.

Granted, you are trapped into the Matrix

I wish that some forum were not broken

Granted, all forums are now broken.

I wish for no pain

Granted, but you said it out loud so you now feel pain

I wish for a flower

Granted, but it emits a noxious gas and you are slowly transmuted into a flower of the same kind.

I wish I had more money.

Granted, you have lots of chocolate money

I wish for more ksp.

Granted, but it's just a neverending series of computer-crumpling explosions.

I wish for more chocolate.

granted, you now have diabeetus.

I wish for MOAR BOOSTERS!!!
